'''''The Nine-Word Rumor''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the hidden exploration objective [[Secret Messages in The Chasm]] by finding all nine secret messages in [[The Chasm: Underground Mines]].

==Trivia==
* The name of this achievement is a reference to the song {{ja|''11文字の伝言''|tl=11-Lettered Message}} by Japanese band ''{{w|Sound Horizon}}''.
